EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Summit_Q413.Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining me at the Asia Pacific Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Asia Pacific Summit - Oct 23-24 Thank You For Joining Pivotal Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madame}},
I wanted to personally thank you for attending this year's inaugural Asia Pacific Summit in Singapore last week. With over 400 attendees helping us to cut the ribbon to open The Pivotal Innovation Centre and introduce Pivotal's first Summit of its kind in the region, I am excited at the momentum Pivotal is creating. This is an extraordinary time for software and I'm thrilled to be at the center of it. On November 12, Pivotal will be announcing something very special. Please join me <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform> and my colleagues at 10AM to found out what platform the next great software companies will use. We will be joined by Pivotal customers and partners for this not-to-miss event.
In the coming weeks Pivotal will make available on-demand replays of my opening remarks, customer case studies and technology workshop sessions on our website. In the meantime, please join me <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform> on November 12 to see what's next for Pivotal.
Best Regards,
Paul Maritz What Can You Do With Hadoop? Register Now >> <http://play.gopivotal.com/Real-timeDataServiceswithHadoop_Register.html> Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Read Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
